sense.def:
A crash
je nezgoda, pri kateri premikajoče se vozilo v nekaj trči in je zato poškodovano ali uničeno.

seg.quote: Her mother was killed in a car crash.

sense.def:
Če premikajoče se vozilo
crashes
, se v nekaj zaleti in je zato poškodovano ali uničeno.

seg.quote: The plane crashed within seconds of taking off.
He crashed his car into the bar.

sense.def:
To crash
pomeni tudi silovito in z glasnim zvokom se premikati ali pasti.

seg.quote: A glass crashed to the floor.

sense.def:
A crash
je tudi nenaden glasen zvok.

The crash of a business
je hud neuspeh podjetja.

seg.quote: ...one of the most spectacular financial crashes of the decade.
